alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 2:26AM EDT until March 14 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Pennsylvania. Portions of northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 2 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Westmoreland Ridges
